complaint_description: The room was not ready at check-in time.
resolution_description: Provided a free room upgrade and complimentary dinner.

complaint_description: Flight delayed by 3 hours without any notice.
resolution_description: Issued a partial refund and a voucher for future flights.

complaint_description: Car was not available at the pick-up location.
resolution_description: Arranged for a different vehicle within 30 minutes.
Sent housekeeping to clean the room again.

complaint_description: Long queue at the entrance of the attraction.
resolution_description: Offered fast-track entry for the next visit.

complaint_description: Flight was delayed without prior notice.
resolution_description: Provided a flight voucher for future travel.
Issued a partial refund and priority access for next visit.
Assisted in retrieving luggage and provided compensation.

complaint_description: Air conditioning not working in hotel room.
resolution_description: Upgraded to a suite at no extra charge.
